files.patch:
@@ -37,1 +37,8 @@
-        location: RUNNER_TEMP
+        location: msys2
+
+      # We can't run bash until this is completed, so stick with pwsh
+    - name: 'Set MSYS2 path'
+      run: |
+        # Prepend msys2/msys64/usr/bin to the PATH
+        echo "$env:GITHUB_WORKSPACE/msys2/msys64/usr/bin" >> $env:GITHUB_PATH
+      shell: pwsh
